actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 924 (c) of title 18 of the United States Code to increase the mandatory minimum penalties applicable to certain firearms offenses.

summary.text: Amends provisions which impose additional penalties for using or carrying a firearm during the commission of a Federal felony to: (1) increase the penalties thereunder; (2) prohibit a suspended sentence for any conviction under such provisions; (3) forbid a defendant to plead guilty of a lesser charge; and (4) render the Federal Youth Correction Act inapplicable to such offenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 924 (c) of title 18 of the United States Code to increase the mandatory minimum penalties applicable to certain firearms offenses.
